title: Shadows Within
description: This is the story of Adara, who goes on an epic journey to save herself... and her country.When Adara's cousin goes missing, she is determined to get her back. And find a way to keep her family safe.Adara suspects the Church of Asier had something to do with Holly's disappearance. After all, Holly is the daughter of the new King and the Church is pushing for a civil war in order to keep magic out of Berender.As tension grows daily, magic might be the only way for Adara to save herself.Adara sets off to find the power she needs, but the Church is not willing to let her go without a fight.Will Adara get the magic to save her country? Or will the Church find her first?This is the first book in the Berender-trilogy.
author: Khidra Kay
